headline: The right solution for every industry
subline: Find your industry and discover how a professional website solves your biggest challenges.
ctaBottom: Your industry not listed? Contact us — we'll find the perfect solution.

restaurant.name: Restaurant
restaurant.tagline: More tables, more revenue — reachable 24/7 for your guests

p1.problem: Customers can't find opening hours and menu fast enough
p1.solution: Digital menu, location and opening hours always up to date

p2.problem: Phone reservations get lost or come outside opening hours
p2.solution: 24/7 online table reservation with automatic email confirmation

p3.problem: No online ordering → revenue from delivery/takeaway is lost
p3.solution: Online ordering system for take-away and delivery

p4.problem: No photos or reviews online → loss of trust with new customers
p4.solution: Gallery, customer reviews and atmosphere insights on the website

cafe.name: Café & Bar
cafe.tagline: Fill events — with a website that conveys atmosphere

p1.problem: Events and seasonal offers only reach regular customers
p1.solution: Event calendar and news section for current promotions

p2.problem: No professional first impression online → less foot traffic
p2.solution: Atmospheric website with gallery and atmosphere photos

p3.problem: Social media alone isn't enough for Google discoverability
p3.solution: SEO-optimized website with Google Maps integration

bakery.name: Bakery & Patisserie
bakery.tagline: Pre-orders and more reach — without extra working time

p1.problem: Customers don't know about branch locations or opening hours
p1.solution: Branch overview with locations, opening hours and directions

p2.solution: Product catalog with seasonal highlights and pre-ordering

p3.problem: Pre-orders for cakes/catering only via phone
p3.solution: Online pre-order form for cakes, catering and bulk orders

p1.problem: Local customers don't know the shop exists
p1.solution: Local SEO strategy with Google visibility and review integration

p2.problem: No online shop → revenue limited to physical store
p2.solution: Online shop with click & collect or shipping option

p3.problem: Promotions and new arrivals only reach existing customers
p3.solution: Newsletter integration and news section for updates

p4.problem: No unique selling point visible against Amazon
p4.solution: Brand presence with story, values and unique assortment

florist.name: Florist
florist.tagline: Make seasonal highlights visible — online and in-store

p1.problem: Seasonal offers (Valentine's Day, Mother's Day) not visible in time
p1.solution: Seasonal landing pages and pre-order functionality

p2.problem: No online ordering system for bouquets and delivery
p2.solution: Product catalog with ordering and delivery option

p3.solution: Portfolio section for weddings and events with gallery

wine.name: Wine & Fine Foods
wine.tagline: More reach, more tasting experiences — bookable online

p1.problem: Assortment can't be searched or compared online

p2.problem: No online shop → customer base limited to local visitors
p2.solution: Online shop with shipping and age verification

p3.problem: Wine tastings and events only promoted by word of mouth
p3.solution: Event calendar with online registration for tastings

handwerk.name: Tradespeople
handwerk.tagline: New contracts through local Google visibility

p1.problem: Not found on Google → contracts go to competitors with websites
p1.solution: SEO-optimized website with service overview and coverage area

p2.problem: Callbacks and appointment requests get lost when fully booked
p2.solution: Contact form and online appointment request with automatic confirmation

p3.problem: No visible references → customers rely on word of mouth
p3.solution: Reference gallery with before/after photos and customer reviews

p4.problem: Time-consuming quote creation via phone costs working time
p4.solution: Quote request form with pre-built service checklists

legal.name: Lawyers & Accountants
legal.tagline: Communicate professionalism and expertise at first glance

p1.problem: New clients search online — firms without websites seem unprofessional
p1.solution: Professional presence with competency profiles and practice areas

p2.problem: First contact only possible by phone → barrier for potential clients
p2.solution: Online contact form and booking reduces the barrier

coach.name: Coaches & Freelancers
coach.tagline: Your own channel instead of platform dependency

p1.problem: Dependent on platforms (LinkedIn) — no own channel
p1.solution: Own website as central hub for visibility and leads

p2.problem: Portfolio only available as PDF or in conversation
p2.solution: Professional portfolio page with projects and testimonials

p3.problem: Appointment scheduling via email = endless back-and-forth
p3.solution: Integrated appointment booking directly on the website

p4.problem: No clear positioning → indistinguishable from thousands of others
p4.solution: Branding website with clear value proposition

realestate.name: Real Estate Agents
realestate.tagline: Own brand instead of portal dependency

p1.problem: Property presentation only via portals → no own brand
p1.solution: Own property gallery with exposés and contact form

p2.problem: Leads only through expensive portal listings

p3.problem: No central place for reviews and references
p3.solution: Success stories and client testimonials as trust signals

doctor.name: Doctors & Practices
doctor.tagline: Online booking relieves reception staff and patients

p1.problem: Patients can't find current info on opening hours and services
p1.solution: Clear practice website with service spectrum and hours

p2.problem: Only reachable by phone during consultation hours → frustration
p2.solution: Online appointment booking relieves reception and patients

p3.problem: New patients compare practices online — no chance without website
p3.solution: Professional online presence with team and practice photos

p4.problem: Forms (anamnesis) only on-site → long wait times
p4.solution: Digital forms to fill in advance on the website

p1.problem: Customers don't know which treatments are offered
p1.solution: Clear service page with explanations and prices

p2.problem: Appointments only by phone → customers book elsewhere online
p2.solution: Online booking system with therapist and time slot selection

p3.solution: Atmospheric website with gallery and ambient photos

fitness.name: Gym & Sports
fitness.tagline: Win new members and retain existing ones

p1.problem: Class schedule changes constantly → members miss updates
p1.solution: Digital class schedule, always current, filterable by class/trainer

p2.problem: Trial training inquiries only by phone or walk-in

p3.solution: Clear pricing page with comparison and online sign-up

p4.problem: Community and success stories aren't shown
p4.solution: Member testimonials and event gallery as motivation

p1.problem: Appointments only via phone or WhatsApp — unstructured
p1.solution: Professional online booking system with confirmation

p2.problem: Services and prices not transparent → customers hesitate
p2.solution: Clear price list with all treatments and options

p3.solution: Permanent gallery on the website as a showcase
